Name: Mind-Blowing Girls 3
About the game: Mind-Blowing Girls 3 - is a puzzle game where you need to assemble a complete image from several pieces. Assemble one big image from small images and you will be able to move to a new level as well as enjoy already assembled images in a special gallery. Features: Size range from 16 to 36 pieces Simple mouse control Traditional logical gameplay Gallery Steam Achievements Press 'F' to complete the level Credits: The game was created using Clickteam Fusion 2.5! Music by Erwarda Savitnaag.
